items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Fit is snug. Very pretty dress, nice and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars great buy
items.body: This dress is perfect for wearing at an LDS Temple If you are a member looking for a simple easy to put on and take off dress that is stylish this is the one I am 5’2 115 and the small fits perfect Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering dress!
items.body: Really beautiful dress! Partially lined, and feels like good quality. A bit too large for me, fabric is heavy enough to cover, wrinkly and not quite a true white. Too much yellow in the fabric to work for the wedding. I'll definitely consider buying the next size down in a different color! Read more
items.author: Book Club Queen

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, feminine, and washes beautifully
items.body: This dress is very pretty and comfortable. It runs a little small though, so I recommend ordering a size up. Also, it is much shorter than I expected. I am only 5' 2" and the hemline falls at mid-calf, not just above the ankle as shown. . I hung it to dry, and no ironing was needed. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made
items.body: It's well made and comfortable. It didn't work for me, but worth it. Read more
items.author: V. Sims

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress, good value
items.body: It's been a good dress Read more
items.author: jp

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Long in the torso
items.body: Didn’t fit high waist enough. I am very high waisted and it fit to make waist. I was looking for empire waist Read more
items.author: Babcia

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality
items.body: The dress is pretty, but the quality is terrible. I ordered this for my daughter’s bridal shower. It had a huge hole in one of the pockets. The loop to fasten the button on the back was broken. I had to fix both because there wasn’t enough time to return it and get another dress. There are random loose strings all over the dress. It’s a beautiful dress, but it’s frustrating that I had to do so much work on it before it could even be worn. Read more
items.author: Disneymom

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, White, Grey Blue, Light Green, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
